snippet: Mr. Kagan was the founding director of the Conference on Jewish Material Claims Against Germany, which sought reparations for the Nazi genocide against European Jews.
abstract: Saul Kagan, former refugee who for decades led the Jewish service organization that was primarily responsible for securing more than $70 billion in restitution for Holocaust survivors and their heirs, dies at age 91.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kagan was the founding director of the Conference on Jewish Material Claims Against Germany, which sought reparations for the Nazi genocide against European Jews.

headline.main: Saul Kagan, Who Won Holocaust Restitution, Is Dead at 91
headline.print_headline: Saul Kagan Is Dead at 91; Won Holocaust Restitution

keywords.value: Conference on Jewish Material Claims Against Germany
keywords.name: organizations
